name: Draft Fantasy Soccer (FPL)
description:
*THIS IS THE OFFICIAL DRAFT FANTASY FOOTBALL (SOCCER) APP*

Experience Premier League Draft Fantasy Football like never before with our Draft Fantasy Football App for the English Premier League (EPL/BPL). As the world leader in draft-style fantasy football (soccer), we’ve built an app for Premier League Draft Fantasy Football that enables you to access your Premier League draft fantasy football teams and leagues wherever you go from the comfort of your phone.

Our app allows you to set your lineups, see how others in your draft fantasy football leagues are doing, transfer players in and out of your draft fantasy football teams, and stay updated each week with live scoring from the world leader, Opta. There is no better way to stay connected to your Premier League Draft Fantasy Football leagues and teams than by downloading the Official Draft Fantasy Football App.

Key Features:
- Join a league and draft your team
- Set your Premier League Draft Fantasy Football line-ups each week
- Follow your Draft Fantasy Football team with live scoring updates from Opta
- Transfer players in and out of your Draft Fantasy Football teams by adding free players or trading with other in your fantasy football leagues


Pro-Tips:
- Use the “More” tab to switch draft fantasy football teams, see the Premier League Table and Fixtures
- Scroll down the “Points” tab to view your fantasy football teams’ Auto-Subs
- Click through other draft fantasy football teams from your league in the “Table” tab to see how their fantasy football team performed


*If you have any complaint/suggestion, please email us at support@draftfantasyfootball.co.uk instead of commenting here and giving a bad rating. That would really help us be sure to help you*
